review: Surprised it took Google this long to make it, but it does not disappoint.
author: Jaymes Stewart

review: Perfect Nifty device as many would have already seen it as - But interesting is the ecosystem of things that are being build on this. Youtube Localcast are amazing goto Apps along with this + Consider Videostream (which not many are aware) but is one of the best Apps which can be used thru Chrome browser Apps to stream "any" format. Helps you to play local stored Media in any format.. and then you have a remove by which you can control and play/browse all local media stored.5 stars no doubt.
author: Anurag

review: Working great , now my friends and family are ordering it.
